note.p: Death: Worting House, near Basingstoke, Hampshire (02 December 1835)
Education: Trinity College, Cambridge. MB (1800), MD (1805)
Career: Practised in London; Physician, St George's Hospital, London (1803-resignation 1816); died of a disease of the liver
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1836 No 27 p 439
References: N G Coley, 'The Animal Chemistry Club; Assistant Society to the Royal Society' in NR 1967 vol 22 pp 173-185
